name: I Will Escape
description: Leave the prison undetected. You will be faced with different types of danger, such as guards, dogs, security cameras and helicopters. Brian has to jump, hang, crawl, kick and climb his way out or hide. He will have to use the environment and it's objects to distract his enemies and set them on the wrong track.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 - 32 or 64bit Processor: Intel® Core™ 2 Quad  2.40GHz, AMD Athlon(tm) X4 760K Quad Core Processor Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GT 525M, Radeon HD6550M Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: OpenAL Compatible Sound Card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 - 64bit Processor: Intel® Core™ i5, AMD FX-6200 Six-Core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 650,  Radeon HD7750 or better Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: OpenAL Compatible Sound Card
